chunks.text: I am Rizki Fajar, a software engineer specializing in full-stack web development. I have experience with React, Next.js, TypeScript, and various backend technologies.
I am originally from Indonesia ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡©, specifically the city of Yogyakarta. Feel free to say hi if you meet me there.

My technical skills include:
- Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS
- Backend: Node.js, Express, Python
- Database: PostgreSQL, MongoDB
- Tools: Git, Docker, AWS
Im currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the Universitas Gadjah Mada. I expect to graduate in August 2025.
I have completed my high school education from SMAN 3 Semarang. There, I've joined a computer club, and participated in a few competitions.
I am currently working as an AI Software Engineer at Platter.ai, where I build AI solutions for government agencies using stack like Python, FastAPI, Haystack, and PostgreSQL.

I have a company which I co-founded and work part-time as a backend engineer on a startup called BeProfesion, an online course platform for exam certification preparation. There I use stack such as NodeJS, MongoDB, and Midtrans Payment Gateway.
